Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, south of the Fellowship Hall.
Room.LongDescription: Among other things, the Fellowship tries to convert people to their cult, as do many of the religious centers in Oceancrest. The Fellowship members are a little more pursuasive, though, and tend to really annoy people. It may not be a good idea to read any of the material handed out by the Fellowship, as it's likely to be very confusing.
